vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Ziphion (H6837), Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Ezbon (H0675), Eri (H6179) and Areli (H0692); also called Arod at Num.26.17;
Also named: a.ro.di (אֲרוֹדִי "Arodi" H0722)
§ Arod = "I shall subdue: I shall roam"
a son of Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞律 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我將征服: 我將漫遊"
迦得的兒子 (民26:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚律 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我将征服: 我将漫游"
迦得的儿子 (民26:17)
